Title: Audit existing Fourseen website
Description: Review current fourseen.com pages. Identify all existing content (text, images, PDFs, contact details). Note anything that must be preserved.

Title: Save copy of current site content
Description: Copy all existing page text into a document. Save any images/logos locally. Keep as a fallback reference.

Title: Define v1 site scope
Description: Confirm v1 pages: Home, What We Do, Approach, About, Contact. Explicitly exclude blog, CMS, extras.

Title: Create sitemap and navigation
Description: Define final navigation structure and logical page order. Ensure it matches HTML header navigation.

Title: Draft page content in plain text
Description: Write content for all pages in content.md or a document. Each page includes H1, 2â€“4 sections, bullet points, CTA.

Title: Install development tools
Description: Install VS Code, Git, and optionally Node.js LTS. Confirm folder-based workflow.

Title: Create local project folder and files
Description: Create fourseen-site folder and add index.html, what-we-do.html, approach.html, about.html, contact.html, styles.css.

Title: Enable live preview with Live Server
Description: Install Live Server extension. Run site locally and confirm auto-refresh on save.

Title: Build reusable page layout
Description: Create template.html with shared header, main, and footer. Duplicate layout across all pages.

Title: Implement mobile-first styling
Description: Define base typography, container width, spacing, buttons, and sections. Ensure layout works on mobile first.

Title: Add contact CTA to all pages
Description: Add consistent Contact Strip inside <main> on every page. Ensure email/phone links work and header Contact button exists.

Title: Create GitHub repository
Description: Create GitHub repo named fourseen-site. Decide public or private.

Title: Commit and push site code to GitHub
Description: Initialise Git repo locally. Commit all files and push to GitHub.

Title: Create Cloudflare account
Description: Sign up for Cloudflare and access dashboard.

Title: Deploy site to Cloudflare Pages
Description: Create Pages project. Connect GitHub repo. Framework: None. Build command blank. Output folder /.

Title: Add fourseen.com as custom domain
Description: Add fourseen.com and www.fourseen.com to Cloudflare Pages project. Note required DNS records.

Title: Update DNS at Njalla
Description: Update DNS records at Njalla or move DNS hosting to Cloudflare (recommended).

Title: Add page titles and meta descriptions
Description: Ensure each page has a unique title and meta description.

Title: Accessibility and performance check
Description: Check mobile layout, contrast, alt text, and heading structure.

Title: Add sitemap.xml and robots.txt
Description: Create sitemap.xml and robots.txt and add to site root.

Title: Establish update workflow
Description: Document update process: edit locally, commit + push, auto-deploy via Cloudflare.
